thread.title: Michael S
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Michael S

author: Michael S
title: Michael S
text: I think the website is nice and clear, with a good description of every item. I live in the US and was immediately offered the option to pay in dollars and to have the item shipped to a UK address. Shipping occurred within a day or so. For me it is a "go to' site for Barbour products
